# {{<fa street-view>}} Short Bio

Debayan Koley is currently pursuing his doctoral degree in Statistics at the Department of Statistics, Banaras Hindu University. He holds a Master's degree in Statistics from Visva-Bharati University and a Bachelor's degree in Statistics from Midnapore College (Autonomous). His primary research interests lie in reliability theory, statistical inference, and Bayesian computation, with a focus on developing methods that are both theoretically robust and practically applicable. Beyond academics, Debayan is a voracious reader across genres and an avid film enthusiast. In his leisure time, he enjoys creative writing and playing the amateur violin.
